string.name: material_switch_msg
string.description: Label for a switch that enables or disables logging. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: enable_logging_switch_msg
string.description: Label for a switch that enables or disables logging. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: rotate_key_button_label
string.description: Label for a button that rotates the encryption key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: decrypt_logs_button_label
string.description: Label for a button that decrypts and views logs. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: decrypted_logs_viewer_title
string.description: Title for the decrypted logs viewer. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: close_button_label
string.description: Label for a button that closes the decrypted logs viewer. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: decryption_warning
string.description: Warning message displayed when the user is viewing decrypted logs. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Decrypted content is only viewable here from memory. It is never stored decrypted anywhere on this device.

string.name: re_encrypt_and_share_button_label
string.description: Label for a button that re-encrypts decrypted logs and shares them. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: no_decrypted_log_content_to_display
string.description: Message displayed when there is no decrypted log content to display. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: No decrypted log content to display.

string.name: error_could_not_load_decrypted_logs
string.description: Message displayed when there was an error loading decrypted logs. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Error: Could not load decrypted logs.

string.name: encryption_key_status_keystore
string.description: Status message indicating the app is using the default Keystore encryption key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: encryption_key_status_external
string.description: Status message indicating the app is using an external encryption key. %1$s is a short identifier/hash of the key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: manage_external_keys_button_label
string.description: Label for a button that opens the screen to manage external encryption keys. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: title_manage_external_keys
string.description: Title for the activity where users manage external encryption keys. [CHAR LIMIT=40]

string.name: external_key_management_info
string.description: Informational text about user responsibility for private keys generated externally. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Logs encrypted with an external key require its corresponding private key for decryption. This app will not store the generated private key.

string.name: status_no_external_key
string.description: Status display in manage keys screen when no external key is active (default text in layout). [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Status: No External Key Active (Using Keystore)

string.name: status_external_key_active_formatted
string.description: Status display in manage keys screen when an external key is active. %1$s is a short identifier/hash of the key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: status_keystore_key_active_priority
string.description: Status display when the internal Keystore key is active and has priority over any external key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: generate_external_key_pair_button
string.description: Label for a button to generate a new external (user-managed) key pair. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: import_external_public_key_qr_button
string.description: Label for a button to import an external public key by scanning a QR code. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: clear_active_external_key_button
string.description: Label for a button to clear the currently active external key and revert to using the Keystore key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: toast_qr_scan_cancelled
string.description: Toast message shown when QR code scanning is cancelled by the user. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: toast_external_key_imported_successfully
string.description: Toast message shown when an external public key is imported successfully. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: toast_qr_decode_public_key_failed
string.description: Toast message shown if decoding a public key from a QR code fails. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Failed to decode public key from QR code.

string.name: toast_import_public_key_error
string.description: Generic toast message shown if there's an error during public key import. Specific error might be logged. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Error importing public key. Please check format.

string.name: toast_import_public_key_error_with_message
string.description: Toast message shown if there's an error during public key import, with a specific message. %1$s is the error message. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: qr_scan_prompt_public_key
string.description: Prompt displayed to the user when the QR code scanner is active for a public key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Scan External Public Key QR Code

string.name: toast_camera_permission_denied_qr
string.description: Toast message notifying that it is impossible to scan a QR code due to the permission to access the device's photo and video camera (camera is a generic term) being denied. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Camera permission denied. Cannot scan QR code.

string.name: toast_new_external_key_generated_successfully
string.description: Toast message shown when a new external key pair is generated successfully. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: New external key pair generated. Public key set for encryption.

string.name: toast_generate_external_key_error
string.description: Generic toast message if an error occurs during external key pair generation. Specific error might be logged. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: toast_generate_external_key_error_with_message
string.description: Toast message if an error occurs during external key pair generation, with a specific message. %1$s is the error message. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: toast_error_generated_private_key_is_null
string.description: Toast message shown if the generated private key is unexpectedly null. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Error: Generated private key is null.

string.name: toast_qr_generation_failed_for_private_key
string.description: Toast message if generating a QR code for the private key fails. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Could not generate QR code for private key.

string.name: toast_qr_scan_failed_no_data
string.description: Toast message if QR scan was technically successful but no content data was found in the result. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Scan completed, but no data found.

string.name: toast_external_key_cleared_successfully
string.description: Toast message shown when the active external key is cleared. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: dialog_title_private_key_security_warning
string.description: Title for the dialog that displays the newly generated private key and warns the user. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: dialog_message_private_key_user_responsibility
string.description: Warning message in the private key display dialog about user responsibility. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: This private key will NOT be stored by the app. You MUST save it securely now. Without it, logs encrypted with its public key cannot be decrypted by you.

string.name: label_base64_private_key
string.description: Label for the text field showing the Base64 encoded private key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: label_private_key_qr_code
string.description: Label for the ImageView showing the QR code of the private key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: dialog_button_acknowledge_private_key_saved
string.description: Button text for the user to acknowledge they have saved the private key. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: toast_barcode_scanner_not_found
string.description: Toast message shown if the required Barcode Scanner app is not installed. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Barcode Scanner app not found. Please install it to scan QR codes.

string.name: private_key_display_format
string.description: Format string for displaying the private key. %1$s is the label, %2$s is the Base64 key. Includes newlines for spacing. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: qr_code_label_display_format
string.description: Format string for displaying the QR code label. %1$s is the label text. Includes a newline for spacing. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: scanner_status_searching
string.description: Label for the text view that displays the scanner status. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.description: Toast message shown when logging is enabled. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.description: Toast message shown when logging is disabled. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Not device owner, cannot enable logging.

string.name: decryption_aborted_no_private_key
string.description: Toast message shown when decryption is aborted because the private key is not available. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Decryption aborted: Private key is not available.

string.name: dpm_not_device_owner_disable_log_failed_toast_msg
string.description: Toast message shown when logging cannot be disabled because the user is not the device owner. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Not device owner, cannot disable logging.

string.description: Label for a text view that displays the encryption key status. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: is not a valid LogBatch format.
